Uses of Class
oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers.ServerConfig

  • Packages that use ServerConfig 
    Package Description
    oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers
    Helper classes that provide easy access to various Kubernetes features.

    • Uses of ServerConfig in oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers

      Subclasses of ServerConfig in oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClusteredServerConfig
      ClusteredServerConfig describes the desired state of a clustered server.
      class  NonClusteredServerConfig
      NonClusteredServerConfig describes the desired state of a non-clustered server.
      Methods in oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers that return ServerConfig 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withEnv(List<io.kubernetes.client.models.V1EnvVar> env)
      Sets the environment variables to pass while starting this server.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withGracefulShutdownIgnoreSessions(boolean gracefulShutdownIgnoreSessions)
      Sets whether to ignore pending HTTP sessions during inflight work handling when gracefully shutting down this server.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withGracefulShutdownTimeout(int gracefulShutdownTimeout)
      Sets the number of seconds to wait before aborting inflight work and force shutting down the server.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withGracefulShutdownWaitForSessions(boolean gracefulShutdownWaitForSessions)
      Sets whether to wait for all HTTP sessions during inflight work handling when gracefully shutting down this server.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withImage(String image)
      Sets the WebLogic Docker image.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withImagePullPolicy(String imagePullPolicy)
      Sets the image pull policy.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withImagePullSecrets(List<io.kubernetes.client.models.V1LocalObjectReference> imagePullSecrets)
      Sets the list of references to secrets in the same namespace to use for pulling the WebLogic Docker image.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withNodePort(int nodePort)
      Gets the NodePort for the server.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withRestartedLabel(String restartedLabel)
      Sets the label that indicates that a server has been restarted.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withServerName(String serverName)
      Sets server's name.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withShutdownPolicy(String shutdownPolicy)
      Sets the shutdown policy used to stop this server.
      ServerConfig ServerConfig.withStartedServerState(String startedServerState)
      Sets the desired startup state.
